# Shell 13 问

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shell-13-wen
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shell-13-wen
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shell-13-wen
shell-13-wen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shell-yisan-wen
shell-yisan-wen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
